1.text: Cut a single piece of duct tape to 9 inches (23 cm).
1.vid: /a/a7/Make a Duct Tape Wallet Step 1 Version 4.360p.mp4

2.text: Place a second piece of duct tape on top of the first one lengthwise.
2.vid: /5/55/Make a Duct Tape Wallet Step 2 Version 5.360p.mp4

3.text: Fold the sticky part of the first strip up over the second piece.
3.vid: /8/8b/Make a Duct Tape Wallet Step 3 Version 5.360p.mp4

4.text: Peel the duct tape up and add another strip.
4.vid: /4/4f/Make a Duct Tape Wallet Step 4 Version 5.360p.mp4

5.text: Continue flipping the duct tape and adding strips to extend the length.
5.vid: /c/c6/Make a Duct Tape Wallet Step 5 Version 5.360p.mp4

6.text: Fold the final piece of tape over the end to make a clean edge.
6.vid: /5/5d/Make a Duct Tape Wallet Step 6 Version 5.360p.mp4

7.text: Trim the edges of the duct tape.

8.text: Fold the rectangle in half lengthwise.
8.vid: /8/8a/Make a Duct Tape Wallet Step 7 Version 5.360p.mp4

10.text: Fold your wallet in half the other direction.
10.vid: /6/65/Make a Duct Tape Wallet Step 8 Version 5.360p.mp4

11.text: Make singular strips of duct tape without sticky sides.

12.text: Peel the tape up and fold the sticky sides down on either end.

14.text: Layer your other pockets below the first one.

15.text: Add pockets on the other side if you want.

16.text: Make a rectangle of duct tape slightly smaller than one side of your wallet.
16.vid: /a/a6/Make a Duct Tape Wallet Step 9 Version 5.360p.mp4

17.text: Cut a piece of clear plastic that's slightly bigger than an ID card.

19.text: Tape the side pocket in place.

20.text: Add a strip of duct tape along either end to seal everything into place.
